body.name: Chrome Battery YTX9-BS Maintenance Free Replacement Battery for ATV, Motorcycle, and Scooter: 12 Volts, 9 Amps, 8Ah, Nut and Bolt (T3) Terminal
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 15 mins
features: BATTERY TYPE: YTX9-BS Absorbent Glass Mat battery is a rechargeable AGM battery that fits in a variety of applications.
TOP TECHNOLOGY: Featuring state-of-the-art Absorbed Glass Mat (AGM) technology, Chrome batteries deliver spill-proof, low-maintenance power, with sealed posts ensuring prolonged durability.
EASY APPLICATION: Chrome Batteries come fully charged and ready to go once delivered. Simply connect your battery to the application and you are ready to go.
BEST POWER SOURCE: Chrome brand batteries are heavier than our other brands; Zipp and Pirate, thus an extended longevity.
UNBEATABLE WARRANTY: Top notch customer service from real battery experts! Guaranteed 18 Months warranty with 75-day refund policy. Extremely Fast 2 day shipping.
body.description: Chrome Battery presents YTX9-BS sealed AGM batteries, the precision power solution. Each battery is constructed with lead calcium alloy and absorbed glass mat technology that allows for a complete maintenance-free and high-performance operation. Chrome Battery features improvements in the longevity, warranty, returns, and shipping over our other brands; Pirate and Zipp. All YTX9-BS Chrome Battery brand AGM batteries are manufactured with the highest quality materials and rigorously tested to ensure safety, OEM compatibility, effectiveness, and optimal performance. YTX9-BS is a 12V 12CCA High Performance Sealed AGM Battery. YTX9-BS has AGM Separators for superior design and durability.YTX9-BS Battery Features: No spills, no leaks, and no water to check. Extreme vibration resistance to ensure maximum conductivity. High Cranking Amps & Low Self-Discharge Rate. Fully charged, ready for immediate use. Fits in a variety of applications, ranging from motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, jet skis, snowmobiles, scooters and more. YTX9-BS AGM Battery Specifications: Model: YTX9-BS Dimensions: (H) 4.13" x (L) 5.91" (W) 3.43" Weight: 6.67 lbs.Volts: 12V Polarity: [+ -]Condition: New. Also Replaces: PTR9-BS, M62R9B, 44156, YTR9-BS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for a 2022 ninja 400,fit perfectly and started right up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It fit perfect. Start strong and easy.Those batteries are cheap but they are perfect.I have this brand in my yamaha vstar1100 for couple years and it is in bike really long time. I think it's from previous owner and that's mean many years!! I can easily say I did like 30k miles and it's still start my bike easy and strong.All I'm doing to protect it is I take it out from bike every winter ( because it's cold there) and I recharge it. About March I put it back and it run forever

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. It fit and has started my motorcycle flawlessly for the last month and a half. We’ll see how long it lasts but it has a good warranty so either way it’s a good deal. I would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great battery, great price.
reviews.reviewText: Great battery. I got this battery for a 99 Honda Shadow VT600CD Motorcycle, and it's been great, virtually no maintenance(it was a pain in the ass to install, due to where the battery goes in my bike no fault of the product itself) and has started every single time.I got my bike used months ago and the previous owner always had power issues he couldn't sort out (flickering lights, stalling out every once in a while, requiring a push start or jump start almost every cold start) and after touching up some general wiring I still had minor issues and especially the failure to start, so I ordered this battery here. I was skeptical at first due to the excellent price, but after putting this battery in my bike it has started like a champ, immediately, every time. I've now been running my bike for several weeks with this battery, as I wanted to be sure it had solved my problem before writing this review, and it's been doing great I haven't had to push start the bike a single time since.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price good product
reviews.reviewText: Great price good product no issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unfortunately I bought a brick
reviews.reviewText: Bought and delivered Nov 2023. Installed in bike wouldn't start so I charged with my motorcycle battery charger for about an hour. Installed on bike (2007 Kawi ZZR600). Started and rode for about 20 miles and stopped for about an hour. Bike started fine, went home. 3 days later went to start it, battery dead. I took it out, charged again till LCD indicator showed full bars indicating full charge. Good voltage. My voltmeter confirmed same voltage as the included LCD indicator. I left it on bench, 3 hours later one of the bars gone indicating 60% - 90% charge. Next morning, no bars, battery is dead. I've been riding almost 50 years. First time I've had a battery out of the box that was dead, cannot hold a charge. I went to dealer and bought from them. All good now. Unfortunately dealer battery more $, plus $ of this battery plus almost a week of fooling around with it. Not going to buy from this vendor again. And not too inclined to buy battery through Amazon again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great came in @ 13.06v!
reviews.reviewText: Update: 8/4/2020 battery still works great!Update 2: 9/26/2021 still works! I can feel the better getting weaker but has never failed to start even after multiple stalls. Always kept on tenderUpdate 3: 5/21/2022 still working! However, due to my negligence it has been fully depleted at least two times causing damage. It still starts but it’s getting weaker so I took it as a sign to simply replace it. Not bad for the ~$30 it originally cost. Will definitely buy again.Pros:Came and worked great tested voltage and it was 100% charged which was nice. 2018 royal Enfield Himalayan cranked instantly whereas it was taking a second or two with the old dying battery( lasted me less than a year of use came with bike).Cons:The screw thingies this comes with suck I had to stack two nuts tall (old and new) taped together to get them to stay since there’s so backstop on either side of the terminal so they slide around and they’re hard to deal with .Will update review if anything changes or if the battery dies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023

reviews.reviewText: It seems to be of good quality . It was able to start my honda generator at minus thirty four degrees celsius. If I get 2 or 3 years out of it I'll be happy.
